inventory.name: Ancient Scroll Fragment
inventory.description: A torn piece of parchment bearing an ancient script and a faded image of a crescent moon. The writing appears to be in a forgotten language, yet whispers secrets to those who listen closely.

inventory.name: Ancient Star Chart
inventory.description: A tattered parchment containing cryptic star maps and celestial navigation charts from a bygone era. The ink appears ancient but still whispers the mysteries of the cosmos to those who listen closely.

inventory.name: Lunar Essence Fragment
inventory.description: A delicate shard of crystal infused with the essence of moonlight. It glows softly, reflecting hues of lunar cycles and whispering secrets to those attuned to its gentle hum.
